ee:variables.ee:set-variable: %dw 2.0 output application/java var objectName = p('salesforce.objects.customerDocument') var limitValue = attributes.queryParams.limit default "100" var offsetValue = attributes.queryParams.offset default "0" --- "SELECT Id, Document_Name__c, Document_Type__c, Related_Customer__c, Uploaded_By__c, Upload_Date__c FROM $(objectName) ORDER BY Upload_Date__c DESC LIMIT $(limitValue) OFFSET $(offsetValue)"

ee:message.ee:set-payload: %dw 2.0 output application/json --- payload map (item, index) -> { Id: item.Id, Document_Name__c: item.Document_Name__c, Document_Type__c: item.Document_Type__c, Related_Customer__c: item.Related_Customer__c, Uploaded_By__c: item.Uploaded_By__c, Upload_Date__c: item.Upload_Date__c }

%dw 2.0 output application/java --- [{ Document_Name__c: payload.Document_Name__c, Document_Type__c: payload.Document_Type__c, Related_Customer__c: payload.Related_Customer__c, Uploaded_By__c: payload.Uploaded_By__c, Upload_Date__c: payload.Upload_Date__c }]

salesforce:query.doc:name: Query Created Record
salesforce:query.salesforce:salesforce-query: #["SELECT Id, Document_Name__c, Document_Type__c, Related_Customer__c, Uploaded_By__c, Upload_Date__c FROM $(p('salesforce.objects.customerDocument')) WHERE Id = '$(vars.createdId)'"]

ee:message.ee:set-payload: %dw 2.0 output application/json --- { Id: payload[0].Id, Document_Name__c: payload[0].Document_Name__c, Document_Type__c: payload[0].Document_Type__c, Related_Customer__c: payload[0].Related_Customer__c, Uploaded_By__c: payload[0].Uploaded_By__c, Upload_Date__c: payload[0].Upload_Date__c }

logger.doc:name: Log Failure
logger.message: Failed to create customer document in Salesforce

ee:message.ee:set-payload: %dw 2.0 output application/json --- { error: "CREATION_FAILED", message: payload[0].errors[0].message default "Failed to create record", timestamp: now(), correlationId: vars.correlationId }
